20101229071024.000|20101229071025.000|CC1|DAVID: IT'S NOT CLEAR WHETHER   
20101229071025.000|20101229071027.000|CC1|THE ACCIDENT WAS CAUSED BY HIGH 
20101229071027.000|20101229071031.000|CC1|WINDS OR A MECHANICAL FAILURE.  
20101229071031.000|20101229071032.000|CC1|THE 35?YEAR?OLD CHAIR LIFT WAS  
20101229071032.000|20101229071035.000|CC1|DUE TO BE REPLACED.

20101229071038.000|20101229071041.000|CC1|TRYING TO CROSS A FIELD THAT    
20101229071041.000|20101229071042.000|CC1|FLOODED WHEN HIS HORSE NAMED    
20101229071042.000|20101229071047.000|CC1|MACK GOT STUCK IN THE MUD AND   
20101229071047.000|20101229071048.000|CC1|MIRE.

20101229071049.000|20101229071050.000|CC1|RESPONDED.                      
20101229071050.000|20101229071052.000|CC1|THEY WERE ABLE IT GET THE HORSE
